name: bLockerman's Minesweeper
description:
Game made by bLockerman666 and aamo_s.

You can customize the board in private servers! (Note that wins don't count in them)
If you don't want to beat the tutorial, you can either skip it temporarily or play in a private server.
Exploiting of any sorts is NOT allowed in this game, and you will be punished for it.

How to play:
The board is divided into tiles, with mines randomly distributed.
To win, you need to step on all the safe tiles, without stepping on a mine.
The number on a tile shows the number of mines around it in a 3x3 area.
Using this information, you can determine tiles that are safe, and tiles that contain mines.
Tiles suspected of being mines can be marked with a flag using the left mouse button.

name: Delta Worlds RPG
description:
Public-Alpha V PA 4.9.4 Rock Sans fight in Event section

One day you wake up and your friend Shopkeeper calls you to help him with one little thing: Saving the world
- he means, the Earth...
To give more context, the game has the same world logic as DELTARUNE
- there are LIGHT and DARK worlds, which had their balance shift, but, three Delta Warriors managed to set up the new balance, containing 3 types of worlds: LIGHT, DARK and SHADOWED. But today, SHADOWED worlds have begun to shift the balance... and the Earth might be at it's edge.

This game has Undertale/Deltarune inspired turn-based RPG battle system, with it's own story, music, sprites and 3D overworld!

The game was inspired by Undertale/Deltarune a lot, and these games were made by Toby Fox, so go support him!

We highly recommend playing UNDERTALE or DELTARUNE before this game to better understand the battle mechanics.

You can count this game as a sequel to Delta Warriors.

Credits are in SETTINGS (in-experience)

name: Doomspire: Portals
description:
The classic Doomspire Brickbattle experience... this time with portals! The enemy towers must be taken down to win! Can you master the ability to use portals to do it?

Hold down G to emote!

Tunneling Device Sound Design by BiddinUp
Portal Rendering Module by EgoMoose

-- Tips & tricks --
- Portals can be placed on trowel walls
- Building a trowel wall below you will launch you up
- If you want to get out of your tower, sometimes breaking your base walls is faster than getting to the top
- Bullets, rockets, and bombs can pass through portals
- Personal explosions can launch you
- Superball inflicts a "Dizzy" effect which causes enemies to take 25% more damage
- The Turret gives 600 points per kill and has a very high amount of damage

name: A Broken Dream DEMO
description:
A story horror game inspired by liminal spaces, dreamcore, and weirdcore. This is NOT a backrooms game.

The dream pills put the user in a guaranteed state of permanent sleep, bound to be wandering in their own lucid dreams forever. Escape reality and enter a surreal paradise, where anything your mind thinks of comes true. 

This is just the Demo for the game, and the full game has not came out yet. Supports both singleplayer and multiplayer. Multiplayer makes sense as your friends are just people you visualize in your dream. Supports PC, Mobile, and Console. 

Created basically as a solo project;

Inspired by dreamcore, weirdcore, liminal spaces, the backrooms, but mostly the first two. The gameâ€™s environment has very unique and amazing aesthetics.

The game also has an original soundtrack (OST) completely made by Snoogle (the solo developer mentioned previously). 

If you enjoyed the demo, you can leave feedback or share the game with others!

name: why me...
description:
Welcome to a short, heartfelt Roblox experience designed for anyone going through tough times. This game is simple and straightforward, but it was made with a purpose: to bring a small moment of comfort to those who might be struggling. I know itâ€™s not a highly polished game, and I didnâ€™t spend tons of hours on itâ€”but I wanted to create something real and sincere.

If youâ€™re here, just know that youâ€™re not alone. Youâ€™re stronger than you might realize, and everyone deserves support and a chance to feel better. Hopefully, this little game can give you a reminder that life is worth it, even when things get hard.

Thank you for playing, and take care of yourself.

Thank you oobja for inspiring me to make this game! <3

- , = , ] , [

name: Piano Keyboard v1.1
description:
A piano keyboard that you can play with your computer keyboard!

Added a limit to prevent playing an unreasonable number of notes. This won't (likely) boot people who bash their keyboards, but it will boot people who use programs to play lots of notes at once.

I highly suggest using sheet music if you are struggling. Otherwise, you may find this piano difficult to play as it is adapted to fit 61 keys on a computer keyboard.

If you're playing with friends, communication is key. Remember, you're not escaping alone â€” you're a team. Working together and combining everyone's thoughts is always better than going solo.

name: [OG] The Mexican Border | RP
description:
Mexican Border RP
Created on: May 10, 2025

Tensions run high at the border. Every car, every person, every decision matters.

In Mexican Border RP, step into the role of a Border Patrol agent, police officer, or soldier working to secure the border and enforce the law. Inspect vehicles, question travelers, and monitor for illegal crossings. Use strategy and teamwork to stay in control.

Not everyone follows the rules. As a civilian, rebel, or runner, your goal is to cross â€” legally or not. Sneak through deserts, forge documents, or distract guards. Outsmart patrols and make your move without getting caught.

This game offers a realistic and intense roleplay environment focused on law enforcement, evasion, and the daily challenges on both sides of the border.

Will you protect the line or cross it?

name: Roblox High School [Legacy]
description:
ğŸ‰ GRAND REOPENING ğŸ‰
The original Roblox High School is officially back!
By popular demand, we've fixed this version of the game and reopened the public servers to everyone again! Enjoy revisiting the classic game much like it was in 2014-2017.

Fixes/adjustments include:
- All gear works again
- Re-added skateboards
- Patched critical bugs
- Player count raised to 30
- Outfits now have 9 hat slots
- Fixed mobile UI
- Various other minor fixes

A new moderation system has also been added to this game. All players must follow the Roblox TOS
- anyone who breaks the rules may be permanently banned. We have zero tolerance for inappropriate behavior or toxic/hateful conduct. We want this to be a safe and fun place for everyone to revisit past memories!

Note that we don't plan on making any other major additions to the game
- we want to keep it as close to the original as possible! Enjoy revisiting the past :)

name: NiC: Cold Front [PRE-ALPHA 1.3.2b] [New Unit]
description:
A New Unit can be unlocked in your tech tree: ARPC. Under wheeled APCs!
New (Free!) unit: TE Tank (Tactical Enforcer), a 4 range "heavy" tank with numerous ways to mitigate damage taken. This unit is fully experimental and may be removed in the future.

You have until mid September to obtain it.

1.25x XP during weekends, and expect weekly patch notes!

We are currently in Pre-alpha. Expect bugs, we are working on them.
Also this is

NOT a historically accurate game. This is ALSO not realistic. Gameplay is first and foremost to realism for this game, expect silly things.

Noobs in Combat: Cold Front is an official spin-off of the original NiC that puts more emphasis on the cold war and fictional aspects present in the game than the original game. It's meant to be a standalone, unique experience with its own universe, characters, and story. 

Expect the full game to release some time next month at the latest, hopefully. Be warned. You should NOT expect to find base NiC gameplay here.

Keybinds
R = Rotate units
Z = Show units range
H = toggle march at same speed
X = ping
C = halt selected units
Q = select all the units
E = deselect all selected units
Left control = see all the units goals positions without having them selected
Left control and click on an unit = select units without deselect.
T + click = move units into a line automatically
Shift + click = move all the selected units in formation rather than all to the same place
Shift + click a unit = selecting all the units of the same type
Shift + press a number = select all units of the same type

MOBILE 
Double tap and hold = dragging to select multiple units at once

While the "Hitbox" issue was lessened, there might still be a slight issue. The "Hitbox" issue due to Roblox's de-sync, meaning as of right now there is no fix. De-sync is basically a delay between user actions, meaning if one thing happens on your screen, it takes 1-2 seconds for it to happen on someone else's screen. 
---------------------------------------------------

name: Scripting School
description:
Scripting School is completely free, and will forever be that way.

Scripting School is a Roblox experience designed to help people learn to script through interactive lessons, tests, and tutorials. We intend to make it easier for people who want to become developers learn. We currently have 4 programming languages in our game: Lua (Roblox), Python, JavaScript, and C++.

We are always looking to improve the quality of our game. We appreciate feedback on our group wall or communication server.

Put two hashtags ## at the start and end of code to make it a code block for uploading your own creations! Example: ##print("hello")##

name: 1867 Historical Role Play
description:
Retrace the footsteps of our ancestors in an 1867 reconstruction of Victorian Luxembourg.

Race through the streets on a â€˜Boneshakerâ€™ velocipede, fly through the air on a steampunk flying machine or paddle down the river and view the city from the safety of your very own rowing boat.

There are more than 100 badges to be won from around this beautiful Victorian city.

Can you clear the rats from the courtyard and pick up pure from the streets, to earn some money for food?

Beware of rogues, ghosts, deadly traps and other dangers!

This game is based on an authentic reconstruction of 1867 Luxembourg. Historical documents and photographs have been used throughout, to create an authentic impression of what the city would have looked like during the mid-nineteenth century.

name: Ocean Conservation Experience
description: Global warming is causing sea levels to rise, threatening coastal population centers as well as heating up the ocean which is extremely dangerous to marine life especially shellfish. Overfishing through trawlers both legally and illegally is depleting our marine life as well as destroying coral reefs. Whales and dolphins are being hunted in horrible ways as well as being used for entertainment by inhumane marine parks. Many pesticides and nutrients used in agriculture end up in the coastal waters, resulting in oxygen depletion that kills marine plants and shellfish. Factories and industrial plants discharge sewage and other runoff into the oceans.
